Text: Thanks again for continuing to upload the Stossel show. I work at night, so I don't always get to watch the show when it is on TV.

Okay yeah (I'm still getting up to speed), so I guess the 18th program was all about the GOP debate and had the rebroadcast cuts from the three "candidate" 2012 shows. So, no post for the 18th from me.

Those interested: STOSSEL for 20110825 was a rebroadcast of the 20100111 show: Politically Incorrect. It's still listed here. As always, post a comment in the most recent episode if you can't get a seed on an archived STOSSEL listing.
STOSSEL continues on vay-cay: show for 20110901 was rebroadcast of 20110602, "Government Help Hurts."
